## A few logical expressions

#wassup bruh?

```{r}
#test some logical statments
#== if something matches

5 == 1
"cat" == "dog"

meds <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
meds == 3
meds == 1 | meds > 3

teddy <- 5
banjo <- 7
tallie <- 4

teddy

teddy <= banjo
```
